listing.title: Three Bedroom Luxury Home for Sale at East Legon Hills
listing.desc: The Type B properties in Paradise Estate are medium-sized villas that come with almost all the practical amenities as seen in a Type A property. There is parking space that can fit two of your cars, while the entrance verandah faces a sweet little garden that is a beautiful green facade to your new home.The main door opens into a vestibule making sure the privacy of the residents is not disturbed. The drawing room is a spacious room to entertain guests or relax with your family. The dining area looks into the garden and has a discreet powder room attached to it. The kitchen is well organized, with imported modular cabinets and fixtures. The massive storeroom is almost half the size of your kitchen, making all your storage worries go away.fully furnished living room and fitted kitchen with oven/microwave/cooker/double door fridge freezer/blender/cooking utensils/plates and cutlery setBalcony Fitted wardrobes Hot Water available in bathrooms and kitchen 247 Water supply Security entry doors Air condition in all areas including bedrooms and living room Communal Swimming pool 247 security services Outdoor playgrounds for children

listing.title: 2 bedroom furnished apartment for rent at East Legon
listing.desc: Experience the ultimate in modern living with this furnished 2-bedroom apartment in the desirable East Legon neighborhood of Accra. This stylish and well-appointed apartment offers a comfortable and convenient lifestyle, complete with a range amenities at your doorstep. This apartment features two spacious bedrooms, a cozy living area, and a fully equipped kitchen. Each room is tastefully furnished, ensuring a comfortable and relaxing ambiance. With ample natural light and contemporary decor, this apartment provides a welcoming and homely atmosphere. As a resident of this apartment, you'll have access to a variety of amenities within the complex. Take a refreshing dip in the rooftop pool while enjoying panoramic views of the city skyline. The on-site laundry facilities make laundry day a breeze, and the presence of a pharmacy ensures convenient access to healthcare needs. Additionally, a grocery store within the building offers easy shopping for daily essentials. Stay fit and active in the on-site gym, and satisfy your culinary cravings at the conveniently located restaurant. Located in East Legon, you'll be within close proximity to a range of dining, entertainment, and shopping options. The neighborhood offers a vibrant and cosmopolitan atmosphere, with easy access to major roads and transportation hubs.

developers.description: Goldkey Properties Limited, established in 1997, is a leading Real Estate development company in Ghana. It is renowned for its leadership, service-driven property management culture and proven-competencies in commercial and residential developments for sale and rental.Goldkey has set its mark on design, quality, total excellence and the best use of space in prime locations. With master-planned Residential, Mixed-use and Commercial developments, it has so far developed an area of approximately 150,000sqm for rental purposes in Accra, including Airport, Cantonments, Ridge, Labone, Abelemkpe and East Legon.Goldkey's competitive advantage is based on focused differentiation. Superior quality, detail and luxury are the standards that Goldkey upholds throughout its projects and these are its key competitive tools in both the rental and the sale markets.The Company is currently developing Cantonments City; a unique mixed-use development with a green park which is set to be the best high street destination to promote brands and work-life balance.The experience of living in a Goldkey Property is unparalleled; from the design-driven cutting-edge facades created in collaboration with some of the world's best architects, to the flawless interiors, designed exclusively for our clients.

developers.description: IndigoHomes is a residential developer committed to helping people love where they live. Present in Ghana, Kenya and Tanzania, we build vibrant, moderately priced homes in secure communities.We design homes known for their quality and their design, blending modern American architecture with timeless features of each destination we are in.In our communities, owners and residents find homes built with attention to detail, integrated green parks and gardens, childrenâ€™s playgrounds, sports courts, swimming pools and more. From relaxing front porches, to covered outdoor kitchens, to paved double car parking spaces, to tree-lined sidewalks, to open floor plans, to gourmet kitchens with engineered stone countertops and top-quality appliances, to master suites with dual vanities, we are expanding expectations for quality and community.About BlackIvy IndigoHomes is a BlackIvy endeavor. BlackIvy is a values-driven U.S. company that builds, operates and scales businesses that drive long-term growth and resilient value in essential sectors â€“ housing, food, healthcare, infrastructure and logistics â€“ in Sub-Saharan Africa. Anchored in Ghana, Kenya and Tanzania, BlackIvy is relentless about quality, conscious about costs and driven to see its products and services enjoyed by more and more people. BlackIvy has offices in Accra, Dar es Salaam, Nairobi, New York and Washington, D.C.

developers.description: Swami India Ghana Limited (SIGL) was incorporated in 2013, under the Companies Act of Ghana. We pride ourselves in being specialists in Real Estate Development, Land Sales, Design & Build, general building, renovations and refurbishments. Yet, our main objective is to be a formidable real-estate company that can provide world-class housing and properties to an emerging Ghana. Our continuous emphasis on quality in construction, building technology and planning is what our residents appreciate the most. And it gives us immense pleasure and happiness that we can give them beautiful and thoughtful homes without costing them the moon.Our Team Over the years, we have built a team of professionals who have specialized in different aspects of design and construction. Each individual brings a set of skills and innovative ideas to the table when it comes to exceeding our clientâ€™s expectations. In fact, the trust people have in the SIGL and its brands is all because of our committed team. And since we want to be the best in our business we work with the best in the business.

developers.description: TToo often home buyers in Accra face the need to compromise when buying a property, forced by market dynamics and unreliable suppliers to sacrifice either location or quality in order to purchase a property they can afford.Our homes present buyers with the opportunity to own a stylish, high-quality home in a central location, at competitive prices. Market leading payment plans (starting from only 10% down payment) make the investment even more affordable.This offer also translates to a high yield investment opportunity for buy-to-let investors.We train our teams to care about the details, whether this is in relation to client communications, managing construction costs, or interior fittings and finishing.This combination has lead to a track record of sell-out developments, market leading asset growth and rental yields, and an impressive record of repeat buyers and referrals.
